description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6evnn","text":"This protocol details the general procedure of Correlative Light Microscopy and Electron Microscopy (CLEM) with conventional chemical fixation and 2D Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM) imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Correlative Light Microscopy and Electron Microscopy (CLEM),Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM),conventional chemical fixation,ASAPCRN, 2d tem clem, 2d transmission electron microscopy, electron microscopy, procedure of correlative light microscopy, correlative light microscopy, general procedure of correlative light microscopy, clem, tem, imaging

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2d03m","text":"Culture cells on poly-d-lysine-coated 35 mm MatTek dish (P35G-1.5-14-CGRD) and transfect the cells with the plasmids of the interest.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bcv2j","text":"Pre-fix the cells in  -warmed 4% PFA and 0.25% glutaraldehyde in the imaging buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1a889","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3B3A22609B7411ECB9B7A9ECC7FA5CC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8msfj","text":"Image with a fluorescence microscopy, find the regions of the interest and their coordinates on the dish, then take the Z-stack fluorescence images and the grids map/coordinate by using phase contrast.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5k87","text":"Fix the cells in 2.5% glutaraldehyde and   sodium cacodylate buffer for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a152c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"95E4E3809B7411ECB9B7A9ECC7FA5CC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"99AA28E09B7411ECB9B7A9ECC7FA5CC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8p9b6","text":"Fix in 2% OsO4 and 1.5% K4Fe(CN)6 (Sigma-Aldrich) in   sodium cacodylate buffer for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":32,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"202ob","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FE81E5009B7411ECB9B7A9ECC7FA5CC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"FB7E69009B7411ECB9B7A9ECC7FA5CC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cke3t","text":"En bloc stained with 2% aqueous uranyl acetate   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"4121B6109B7511ECB9B7A9ECC7FA5CC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"453AC0C09B7511ECB9B7A9ECC7FA5CC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fd7h","text":"Add two drops of pure Epon into the center of the glass bottom of the culture dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ba4ks","text":"Cell of interest were relocated based on the pre-recorded coordinates under a stereomicroscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4sq1m","text":"Trim and cut ultrathin sections (50-60 nm) with microtome.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4rhub","text":"Observe the ultrathin sections in a electron microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
